name: Fluxfire
description:
A prototype game i´ve made,  it´s a first person shooter, i would say it´s semi-realistic, something like Counter-strike or Rainbow 6 siege. 

The game is currently only a week in development so if you find any bugs/glitches please report them to me in the comments so i can fix them.

Controls (Theese are default, you can set keybinds to your liking in the settings)

Q - lean left

E - lean right

F - inspect weapon

T - Customize weapon attachments

Left control - Crouch

Left shift - Run

Space - Jump (this one you can´t set in game)

Escape - Exit from testing level to main menu
